summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive Backcocokind's must-have Rosewater Post Cleansing Toner Spray helps hydrate, soothe, and balance your skin. Suitable for use along every step of your skincare routine, this toner also helps pH balance skin and prep skin for the moisturizing step.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydrates, soothe, and balance skin's PhActs as a second cleansing stepSets makeupKey IngredientsRose Hydrosol - obtained by steaming rose petals, rose hydrosol helps hydrate and calm skin while also balancing its pH levelsItem 2566401How To UseCocokind Rosewater Toner can be sprayed directly onto skin, or sprayed onto a cotton pad and then gently wiped all over face. Use as much as you like throughout the day!IngredientsRosa Damascena Flower Water/Aqua*, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate.* Certified Organic (USDA Seal + Certified By Oregon Tilth).
how_to_use: Cocokind Rosewater Toner can be sprayed directly onto skin, or sprayed onto a cotton pad and then gently wiped all over face. Use as much as you like throughout the day!
ingredients: Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate.* Certified Organic (USDA Seal + Certified By Oregon Tilth)

reviews.headline: Highly recommend
reviews.comments: I'm using this with Avene cream and face wash. it's a game changer for sure. It calms my redness instantly and I don't have as many break outs. Its hydrating and calming for the skin.

reviews.headline: Cocokind Rosewater Spray
reviews.comments: I do like this toner for its hydration properties and that it is kind to my ache prone sensitive skin. I use it in the morning and at night before bed. The only con I have is that this does not smell like roses but tomatoes to me. It kind of reminds me of Crabtree and Evelyns Garden scent-- that greenery garden and tomato smell. I have made Rosewater before from roses I grow in my yard, and this Rosewater smells NOTHING like that. That's why I knocked off 1 star. Otherwise, it's a great hydrating spray. Definitely recommend ðŸ’¯

reviews.headline: Fresh and light
reviews.comments:
Not a very strong smell. Feels very light on face. 
Would buy again

reviews.headline: Changed my skin texture
reviews.comments: I bought this during a sale event last year. I had never used rose water before. I now keep extra in case I run out. I love this brand and i stand by this toner especially.

reviews.headline: Love this toner
reviews.comments: I am not a fan if rose scented products, but thisis beeu tolerable and not strong. I love the way it makes my face feel and its refeshing on my skin. I recently swotched to this entire line for my skin care. I an ao happy I did.

reviews.headline: Worth it
reviews.comments: I never write reviews but this has been the best addition to my skin care routine. I mix this with my moisturizer and my dry skin has never been this healthy and so quick. The smell was not my favorite in the beginning but i can get over that for what its doing

reviews.headline: It's rosewater
reviews.comments: I like rose water sprays, I like that this one is organic and packaged in glass, but there are comparable products cheaper. I bought it on sale to see if there was some notable difference but it's the same rose water lol, so I wouldn't pay full price for this.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: This toner is so light and refreshing. I love that i can use it throughout the day when my skin needs a little refreshing.

reviews.headline: Is refreshing
reviews.comments: I got this product to try it and I love the way it leaves your skin looking dewy and refreshed!And the smell is also pleasant! Has not caused any breakouts either, I'm so glad since my skin is quite oily.

reviews.headline: favorite "rose" toner
reviews.comments: I use this several times a week on my face before applying a hyaluronic acid serum & it truly hydrates my skin wonderfully! I also use this post shaving before I apply soothing serums + an ingrown serum & it truly makes my shaved areas feel refreshed, hydrated & calm. I will continue to always have this on hand!

reviews.headline: One of my favss
reviews.comments: Love this toner soo much. Leaves my skin hydrated without any irritation and is honestly safe for all skin types and ages.

reviews.headline: Sensitive Skin Approved
reviews.comments: My partner and I use this after we cleanse. Great toner with no irritation. Hydrates face and feels fresh. I wish Cocokind sold a big bottle to refill the containers. I'm on my 4th bottle now and looking a others ways to reuse the bottles instead of tossing them in recycling lol

reviews.headline: In love
reviews.comments: I love this spray! Its smells nice, its easy to apply, feels nice and makes my skin look great.

reviews.headline: DONT SLEEP ON THIS!!!!
reviews.comments: You dont know you need it until you try it! I was skepitcal at first because i have very acne prone skin, but this almost calms downs my break outs! I use this morning, night, and throughout my makeup routine. My boyfriend complimented me on how glowy and nice my skin looked, so major confidence booster! And its so refreshing and tightens your skin a bit directly after patting it in. LOVE IT < 3333

reviews.headline: Redness GONE
reviews.comments: I never thought I would ever say I found a product that soothed my redness, but this is the one!

reviews.headline: don't sleep on this
reviews.comments: Ever since I heard Salma Hayek say that she uses rosewater to keep her skin looking young vibrant I've been trying to find a rose water that is a game changer. Do not sleep on cocokind. I tried the heritage one and it was hydrating but cocokind reduced my texture significantly,  my skin is supple and plump and very hydrating. I use this in morning and night after cleansing and do not wash my face in morning.  you will notice the difference!

reviews.headline: So refreshing!
reviews.comments: Smells clean and refreshing! Peeped my skin for the day!

reviews.headline: My skin craves it!
reviews.comments: This product feels sooo refreshing and is a must in my skincare routine. I also love how it lasts me a few months

reviews.headline: Made my skin burn
reviews.comments: I really wanted to like this product, however, my extremely sensitive, eczema-prone skin was irritated by the toner. Had to return it since my skin immediately turned red after spraying it on. Looks like a good product for non-sensitive skin!

reviews.headline: Best product
reviews.comments:
The best pure rosewater i've used as far ðŸ¥° 
So happy i discovered this product! 
Thankyou cocokind

faceoff_positive.comments: I have sensitive skin and have been searching for a mild rosewater toner that will not irritate my face. I have tried a lot of the "natural" toners but they still make me red and puffy. Everything I have found seems to have so many ingredients and all I want is rosewater. I was so happy to have found this and tried it. It only has the 1 ingredient and does not irritate my face whatsoever. I was nervous at first as there are some reviews claiming it has a vinegar smell. I have not found that to be true. I think it smells just as you would expect from a rosewater toner, it smells like roses. I will definitely be buying again and recommend to anyone looking for a simple rosewater toner without all those extra ingredients that works as it should and doesn't irritate the face, neck, or chest. Love, love, love this product!!
faceoff_positive.headline: Hands down my favorite toner

Does not irritate my sensitive skin, nor cause breakouts, and the scent is barely there, and dissipates very quickly! ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s just perfection!
faceoff_negative.headline: Favorite Cocokind product!
